name: Heist Racer
description:
-IMPORTANT-

Press "Z" to scale up the window

W A S D  to move

"Space" to Interact

instead of actually racing his enemies like in his bet, he decided to sabotage all racer's vehicles.  you gotta sneak into the warehouse and damage their motorcycles.  Can you beat them in the race the next day?

Game by MattAnimation and Nando
